question: Which organisation in association with World Bank has released the report named “Global Estimate of Children in Monetary Poverty – An update”?
explanation:
‘Global Estimate of Children in Monetary Poverty: An Update’ is an analysis on children living in poverty, released by World Bank Group and UNICEF.
As per the estimate, 1/6th of the total 356 million children of the world, were living in extreme poverty before the COVID-19. The report states that sub-Saharan Africa accounts for two thirds of children living extreme poverty.
